00025 #ifndef __AUDACITY_INTERPOLATE_AUDIO__
00026 #define __AUDACITY_INTERPOLATE_AUDIO__
00027 
00028 #include "Audacity.h"
00029 
00030 // See top of file for a description of the algorithm.  Interpolates
00031 // the samples from buffer[firstBad] through buffer[firstBad+numBad-1],
00032 // ignoring whatever value was there previously, and replacing them with
00033 // values determined from the surrounding audio.  Works best if the bad
00034 // samples are in the middle, with several times as much data on either
00035 // side (6x the number of bad samples on either side is great).  However,
00036 // it will work with less data, and with the bad samples on one end or
00037 // the other.
00038 void AUDACITY_DLL_API InterpolateAudio(float *buffer, int len,
00039                                        int firstBad, int numBad);
00040 
00041 #endif // __AUDACITY_INTERPOLATE_AUDIO__
00042
